name: Poly Connection
description:
Poly Connection is a connect dot puzzle game.
It’s simple: Draw lines to connect dots that share the same colour and fill the hollow dots to pass the puzzle levels. On Challenge mode, a cute image hide in dots, try to complete these levels.
Colourful and light levels give you Fun and enjoyable gameplay environment.
Level can be completed with many ways. Just draw it!
Features:
• Free to play, suitable for all ages.
• Many images about animal, fruit…
• Cute Origami design.
• There is no timer or pressure.
• You can share your favorite levels with friends on your social media channel.
• Poly Connection is free and you can play it anywhere, anytime. However, you can always buy hints to help you in harder levels or pay a price to remove the ads.
